text:
@CNN Prepare yourselves for a longer period of death & spread of the Coronavirus. Look at the language they use. "OPEN BACK UP FOR BUSINESS". Reason; "to save the country from economic failure." Who cares that Blacks/Latinos dying more, no PPE, misinformation, etc . 
STUPID!!!
